adjective.description: Of or relating to the Périgord region in the department of Dordogne in south-west France.
Archaeology. Designating or relating to a French Upper Palaeolithic culture characterized by flint tools of the kind found at Laugerie-Haute in the Périgord region.

noun.description: Chiefly Archaeology. A person of the Perigordian culture.
Archaeology. The Perigordian period or culture.

origin: Mid 18th century. From the name of Périgord + -ian.
